column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " If anything goes wrong , come back immediately . "
#Text=Jinora says : " I will . "
#Text=Korra says : " What happened ?
#Text=It 's completely deserted .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " They 're not down there ?!
#Text=" Korra says : " Jinora , you 've read all about Ba Sing Se .
#Text=Can you think of any other places the airbenders might be ?

#Text=" Jinora says : " I guess they could be in the catacombs beneath the Upper Ring , or the ancient sewers beneath the Lower Ring , or the maze of tunnels that connect the rings together , or they could be — " Tenzin says : " There are just too many places .
#Text=There has to be another way to locate them .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe there is .
#Text=How did you find me during Harmonic Convergence ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I just kind of focused on your energy .
#Text=I think our spiritual connection led me to you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe you can find Kai the same way .
#Text=I know you two have a connection .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What do you mean " a connection " ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " I do n't know .
#Text=Let me try .
#Text=" Yung says : " Thanks .
#Text=" Dai Li sergeant says : " You again ?!
#Text=If you have time to help your friend , then you 're not getting enough rocks for yourself !
#Text=" Dai Li sergeant says : " I guess you 're not as good as you thought .
#Text=" Dai Li sergeant says : " Throw him in the hole !
#Text=" Kai says : " Jinora ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " It worked !
#Text=" Kai says : " How are you here right now ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Shh , quiet .
#Text=It 's a high - level airbender move .
#Text=With a little spiritual stuff thrown in .
#Text=" Kai says : " At first , for a second there , I thought you were a ghost .
#Text=" Jinora says : " It 's good to see you .
#Text=We 've been looking for you and the other airbenders .
#Text=We 're going to get you all out of here .
#Text=Where are we anyway ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Underground somewhere .
#Text=Other than that , I do n't have a clue .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'll figure it out .
#Text=Do n't worry .
#Text=" Kai says : " Jinora !
#Text=Thanks .
#Text=" Jinora says : " The Earth Queen 's Temple !
#Text="
